name: Rogue Station Defense
description:
Rogue Station Defense is a roguelike tower defense game where you travel between planets, space stations and starships to clear out alien infestations. Open the doors and let the aliens loose, while building powerful towers to defeat them! Collect credits and items to research technology and upgrade your towers.

Features

  • Exciting tower defense gameplay
  • Procedurally generated maps, monsters and items
  • Customizable towers
  • Extensive talent grid
  • Available on Android and PC

In development

Rogue Station Defense is currently in early stages of development, we are currently working on building the game's features and then looking to proceed with providing a rich amount of content.
